mapper.select: select * from LOC_DB WHERE dong LIKE '%' || #{dong} || '%' OR dong_sub LIKE'%' || #{dong} || '%' OR sido LIKE'%' || #{dong} || '%' ORDER BY code
select * from stores where store_lat<#{bukdonglat} and store_lat>#{namsualat} and store_lng<#{bukdonglng} and store_lng >#{namsualng} and enabled=1

select * from stores s join foodmenu f on s.username = f.username where store_lat<#{bukdonglat} and store_lat>#{namsualat} and store_lng<#{bukdonglng} and store_lng >#{namsualng} and enabled=1 order by s.username desc
select count(*) from foodmenu where username = #{store_name}
SELECT * FROM eattogether_room er join users u on u.username=er.ER_MASTER where er.username = #{store_id}

INSERT INTO eattogether_room (er_no,ER_MASTER,username,er_title,er_content,er_time,er_tend,er_max,er_postdate) SELECT SEQ_ERR.nextval,#{username},#{store_id},#{ERtitle},#{ERcontent},#{ERtime},#{ER_TEND},#{ERmax},SYSDATE FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM eattogether_room WHERE USERNAME = #{store_id} AND ER_MASTER=#{username})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO er_members (erjoin_num,er_no,username,erjoin_date,erjoin_role,erc_no) SELECT SEQ_ERMEMBERS.nextval,#{er_no},#{username},sysdate,0,#{erc_no} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM er_members em join eattogether_room er on er.er_no=em.er_no WHERE em.USERNAME = #{username} and er.er_no = #{er_no} )

INSERT INTO er_chat(erc_no,er_no,erc_content) SELECT SEQ_ERC.nextval,#{er_no},'어서오세요 같이먹자 채팅방입니다.즐거운 시간되세요!' FROM DUAL WHERE not EXISTS (SELECT * FROM er_chat ec join eattogether_room er on ec.er_no=er.er_no WHERE USERNAME = #{store_id} AND ER_MASTER=#{er_master})
mapper.select: select count(*) from er_members where er_no = #{er_no} and erjoin_role=1
select er_no from eattogether_room where er_master = #{username} and username = #{store_id}
select ER_MASTER from eattogether_room where er_no = #{er_no}
mapper.update: update er_members set ERJOIN_ROLE = 1 where username = #{username}
mapper.select: select erc_no from er_chat where er_no = #{er_no}

select em.er_no, em.username , em.erjoin_date, em.erjoin_num, em.erjoin_role, em.erc_no, er.er_master,er.username as store_id, er.er_title,er.er_content,er.er_time,er.er_tend, er.er_max,er.er_max, er.er_postdate from er_members em join eattogether_room er on em.er_no = er.er_no where em.username=#{username} and em.erjoin_role=1 ORDER BY erc_no DESC
select erc_content from er_chat where erc_no = #{erc_no}
select u_nick from users where username = #{username}
mapper.update: update er_chat set erc_content = #{erc_content} where erc_no = #{erc_no}
